channel.title: BBC Middle East
channel.description: Feed from BBC Middle East - with images and summaries

item.title: Israeli soldiers shot a Palestinian boy and stood around as he bled to death, video shows
item.description:
Israeli forces blocked Palestinian ambulances while a 14-year-old lay bleeding for at least 45 minutes.

item.title: US and Iran to hold talks as pressure for nuclear deal builds
item.description:
The indirect negotiations are seen as a last-ditch effort to prevent a conflict, but the chances of a nuclear agreement are unclear.
